item.title: Week 04 - Probability and Bayes' Theorem
item.description: Handouts Equations Lab Problem Set 02 Weekly Prep Lecture Slides Weekly Prep Instructions I’ve posted the first weekly prep of the semester. The instructions are available in the Week-04 GitHub repository. Make sure you submit your work and answers by the beginning of class on Monday! Replication Probability in the News FiveThirtyEight just published a great article on the use probability in news media coverage.
